name: Thread Safe
description:
Uh oh, you got a loose thread, and it's snagged on something.

If you can't figure it out (somehow) controls are WASD or arrow keys to move, W, up arrow or space to jump, E to interact, R to restart level.

Source code:

https://github.com/monster860/thread-safe

Alternate link:

https://monster860.github.io/thread-safe/

Art, music, code, game engine, etc. is done by me. Programmed in TypeScript, used Webpack for building, and levels were made using Tiled map editor.
